title: The Holocaust: Ghetto Theresienstadt - Deception and Reality
description:
Ghetto Theresienstadt: Deception and Reality (2006) UK

Box cover: http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/7792/ghettotheresienstadtmu1.jpg

Dir., Irmgard von Zur Muhlen

Documentary: Between 1941 and 1945, the small fortress town of Theresienstadt in Czechoslovakia became a transit point to the death camps in the east for thousands of European Jews. Theresienstadt was described by the Nazis as a comfortable and peaceful \"Reich home for the aged,\" but its true conditions were far different. From 1943, following international concern, Theresienstadt was turned into a \"show camp;\" a large scale \"beautification\" program gave the place a pleasant and respectable facade, which the S.S. put to its intended purpose in a propaganda film. Their deception succeeded in hiding the terrible truth until the arrival of the Allied armies.  

Ripped from a DVDR someone upped to Usenet.

In English.
